name: The Calm Before The Draw
description:
Yee-haaaaa partner! Whad'ya say? You got yoursel' in heeeeps of trouble with some no-good, two-timing, varmints?! Well shoot, I guess you're just gonna have t' shoot 'em!

What? Don't shoot 'em? Pffft, you youngsters. Aww right, I guess you could try'n talk 'em down peacefully. 

Not t'worry! I'll teach you how to handle a fine ol' western standoff. Ya jus' gotta hold your gun up real frighteningly, and make sure none'a them rascals get no funny idears, y'hear?

The Calm Before The Draw is an entry into the Trijam 3-Hour Game Jam (Theme: Don't Shoot!) for April 10th, 2023.

Note for Linux users: I currently am unable to test the Linux build. I have no reason to believe there would be any issue, but if there is please let me know and I'll do my best to resolve it.

Assets:

Kenney 1-bit pack

Bang/firework sounds by rubberduck on opengameart.org

"Spaghetti Western" by Spring Spring on opengameart.org
